result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian Wayne Matteau was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: PP $50.00 PER MONTH COMMENCING NOVEMBER 15, 2016 AND ON THE 15TH DAY OF EACH MONTH THEREAFTER - PP COVERS 15CF329 & 15CF411

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Reminder Notice dated October 5, 2018 was returned from the post office:  Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward.
Reminder Notice
Amended PAYMENT PLAN FORM - SIGNED
Letter to Judge from defendant dated 4/30/18
Def incarcerated for 60 days.  Court amends payment plan to $50 per month starting July 15, 2018 and due by the 15th day of each month until paid in full.  Payment  plan form sent to Jail.
First payment will be in by April 6, 2018, close of business.

PAYMENT PLAN FORM - SIGNED
$50/mth. beginning April 1, 2018 and the 1st of each mth. until paid in full.
PER JUDGE GOODMAN

Current: 1000 Central Avenue, Apt. 1, Sparta, WI 54656 United States  (Effective: 01-19-2018)
Prior: 220 N Water St #1, Sparta, WI 54656 United States
Court approved $50 per month payment plan starting April 1, 2018 and due the 1st day of the month until 15CF411 and 15CF329 are paid in full.  Address changed.  Payment plan form mailed.
paid $225.00 back on payment plan for 15CF329 and 15CF411, must sign up for payment plan by 2/5/18 or total amount will be due on that day

If defendant pays $225.00, the commitment orders shall be canceled.  Mr. Matteau is currently in a Milwaukee jail.  He will be released 1-18-18.  He is to sign up for a payment plan by February 2, 2018 or the balance will be due in full by close of buiness February 2, 2018 on 15CF411 and 15CF329.

DEFENDANT MUST COMPLY WITH THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM.  
DEFENDANT MAY ONLY BE RELEASED ON WEEKDAYS (EXCLUDING HOLIDAYS) FROM 8:00 A.M. UNTIL 4:00 P.M.  DEFENDANT MUST GO IMMEDIATELY TO THE JUSTICE PROGRAMS OFFICE UPON SIGNING OF BOND AND/OR RELEASE.  THE BOND MONITORING PROGRAM IS LOCATED AT 919 HOESCHLER DRIVE, SUITE 100, SPARTA, WI.
CURFEW FROM 7:00 P.M. UNTIL 7:00 A.M. EXCEPT FOR WORK, TREATMENT OR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY IF APPROVED BY BOND MONITORING AHEAD OF TIME.
